activities: Guess processes EEA and Swiss personal data relating to employees of Guess?, Inc.'s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management, as a data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, HR data, Manually processed data is covered
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
